hangman - package hangman
 
Hangman - Class in hangman
This abstract class is the superclass of Hangman Traditional and Hangman Evil
Hangman(ArrayList<String>) - Constructor for class hangman.Hangman
Constructor for this class Initialize the random word covers by underscores
HangmanEvil - Class in hangman
This is subclass of Hangman Class, This class will represent and play the game in Hangman Evil version
HangmanEvil(ArrayList<String>) - Constructor for class hangman.HangmanEvil
create instance of evil hangman with given list of words.
HangmanEvilTest - Class in hangman
 
HangmanEvilTest() - Constructor for class hangman.HangmanEvilTest
 
HangmanGame - Class in <Unnamed>
This class will control and process the Hangman Game
HangmanGame() - Constructor for class HangmanGame
 
HangmanTraditional - Class in hangman
This is a subclass of Hangman(the superclass) This class will play the game of Hangman regular version
HangmanTraditional(ArrayList<String>) - Constructor for class hangman.HangmanTraditional
Create instance of traditional hangman with given list of words
